sentence.Network_en: She expressed resentment at being interviewed by a social worker.
sentence.Network_cn: 她表达了对被一位社工采访的愤恨。

sentence.Network_en: This issue has aroused much resentment among the masses.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个问题在民众中间引起了强烈的不满。

sentence.Network_en: His resentment of her behaviour was becoming more vociferous.
sentence.Network_cn: 他越来越大声地表达对她行为的厌恶。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... resent 愤慨 resentment 愤慨 reservation 预约;保留.
sensed a little bit resentment in that ., 我觉察到一丝怨气.
HR英语_百度文库 ... 忧虑 fear 忿恨 resentment 士气 morale.
At first Connie suffered from the steady drizzle of resentment that came from the village ., 起初 , 康妮对于村人这种淫雨似的下个不尽的仇恨 , 很觉痛苦.

list.abs: localdog.bokee.com ... 愤愤不平— —be indignant;feel aggrieved;be resentful 愤世嫉俗— —detest the world and its ways.

apart from any moral considerations this a stupid method of training , for it produces a resentful animal who at a later stage may well turn man-killer .撇开道义方面的考虑，这种调驯法是愚蠢的，因为这种方法会使大象“怀恨在心”，在以后某个阶段它很可能变成伤人的动物。
I resent your supercilious and arrogant attitude ., 我讨厌你这种目中无人的傲慢态度.
I resent your supercilious and arrogant attitude ., 我讨厌你这种目中无人的傲慢态度.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Italian risentimento or French ressentiment, from obsolete French resentir (see resent)

entry.def: Resentment is bitterness and anger that someone feels about something.

example.ex: She expressed resentment at being interviewed by a social worker...
example.tran: 她表达了对被一位社工采访的愤恨。

example.ex: But the problems of inflation and unemployment still cause a lot of resentment.
example.tran: 但是通货膨胀和失业问题仍然激起了很多人的怨恨。

means.word_mean: 1. a feeling of deep and bitter anger and ill-will

auth_sentence.content: This resentment expressed itself in...an exuberance of family cordiality.
auth_sentence.res_content: This resentment expressed itself in...an exuberance of family cordiality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This resentment expressed itself in...an exuberance of family cordiality.

auth_sentence.content: She was shaking with passion, anger and resentment.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was shaking with passion, anger and resentment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was shaking with passion, anger and resentment.

auth_sentence.content: It only leads to the resentment of the many.
auth_sentence.res_content: It only leads to the resentment of the many.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It only leads to the resentment of the many.

stems_affixes.word_buile: consent[n.&v.[to]同意,赞成,答应]+ient=ent表形容词→adj.同意的, 无异议的
dissent[v.不同意,持异议]+sion→dissension意见不合
scent=sent感觉→ n.气味，香味；香水 v.嗅猎；察觉
sent感觉+ence表名词→根据感觉来判断→判决，宣判
con共同+sent感觉→共同感觉→同意
as一再,一样+sent感觉→一样的感觉→赞同
dis分开+sent感觉→感觉不合→不同意
scent=sent感觉→ n.气味，香味；香水 v.嗅猎；察觉

Sentence.sentence: Simmering (难以平息的) resentment is seldom an aid to education.

sentences.en: Don’t let your resentment build up.
sentences.cn: 别让你的怨恨郁积起来。

sentences.en: All her feelings of resentment just came pouring out.
sentences.cn: 她一股脑儿倾吐出所有的怨恨。

sentences.en: A greater cause for resentment is the discrepancy in pay.
sentences.cn: 导致愤怒的更主要原因是报酬上的差异。
